measure.name: Residential Dishwasher
measure.description: Adds a dishwasher to the user selected space. The energy consumption can either be defined based on the Building America Benchmark dishwasher (which consumes 87.6 + 29.2 * Num_bedrooms kWh/yr and 2.26 + 0.75 * Num_bedrooms gal/day) or a user defined annual energy and hot water consumption.
measure.modeler_description: Adds an electric equipment object. TODO: SHould this add a hot water consumption object (once water heaters are added), or should the water heater measure have objects for has_dishwasher, etc.
